newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy BTP/Bund spread can fall further - Ciampi.
newsitem.headline: Italy BTP/Bund spread can fall further - Ciampi.

text.p: The yield spread between Italian government 10-year bonds (Btp) and German 10-year bunds, which earlier on Wednesday hit a record low, can fall further, Treasury Minister Carlo Azeglio Ciampi said.
"The Btp/Bund spread is dropping and can still drop further," Ciampi told a meeting of the Italian Banking Association.
The Italian February 2007 Btp fell to a record low of 116 basis points over the July 2007 Bund earlier in the day. -- Rome newsroom +396 6782501
